black-community.name: Black Mental Health Alliance
black-community.description: Provides culturally relevant resources for the Black community.

black-community.name: Therapy for Black Girls
black-community.description: A space for Black women to find mental health support, therapists, and community.

asian-community.name: Asian Mental Health Collective
asian-community.description: Support and education for mental health in Asian communities.

asian-community.name: The National Asian American Pacific Islander Mental Health Association (NAAPIMHA)
asian-community.description: Promotes mental health and wellness across Asian American communities.

latinx-community.name: Latino Mental Health Association
latinx-community.description: Provides culturally appropriate resources and support for the Latino community.

latinx-community.name: Mental Health America - Latinx Support
latinx-community.description: Resources and support to address mental health concerns in the Latinx community.

indigenous-community.name: Native American Rehabilitation Association
indigenous-community.description: Provides services to Native American individuals and families in need of mental health support.

indigenous-community.name: National Indigenous Women's Resource Center
indigenous-community.description: Works to support Indigenous women in crisis, including mental health services.
